title: Wagner Spraytech C900086.M TurnTable for Paint Spraying 11" Diameter Round Platform to Hold Spraying Projects, Smooth Rotation for Paint Spraying and Crafting Projects
description: Spray paint your projects using the revolving turn table. This stand makes it simple to spray paint at all angles of lamps, frames, and other decorative items. It can also be used for a variety of craft projects. The 11” diameter and sturdy construction is perfect for holding all of your painting or decorating projects. At a height of 3”, it provides the ideal amount of space for your hand to freely spin the wheel. The concentric circles etched into the wheel of the turn table help center your item for perfect rotation. Hold up to 15 lbs. comfortably.
